Peg Boggs (Dianne Wiest) is an Avon saleswoman who accidentally discovers Edward (Johnny Depp), a young man who lives alone in a castle on top of a mountain and it was actually created by an inventor (Vincent Price), who died before giving hands to be strange, which only has huge blades in their place. This prevents power approaching human, except to create revolutionary haircuts, but he gives vent to his inner loneliness to prune the vegetation in the form of pictures or sculpt beautiful images on ice. However, Edward is a victim of his innocence and, if it is loved by some, is chased and used by others.
